<!-- If you need help or think you have found a bug, please help us with your issue by entering the following information (otherwise you can delete this text): -->

Output of `helm version`:
```
Client: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.13.1", GitCommit:"618447cbf203d147601b4b9bd7f8c37a5d39fbb4", GitTreeState:"dirty"}
Server: &version.Version{SemVer:"v2.13.1", GitCommit:"618447cbf203d147601b4b9bd7f8c37a5d39fbb4", GitTreeState:"clean"}
```

I packaged `cert-manager` myself into a `.tar.gz` file. The archive contents looked like:
```
OWNERS
values.yaml
requirements.lock
Chart.yaml
requirements.yaml
README.md
webhook/
webhook/templates/
webhook/templates/ca-sync.yaml
webhook/templates/rbac.yaml
webhook/templates/pki.yaml
webhook/templates/service.yaml
webhook/templates/deployment.yaml
webhook/templates/apiservice.yaml
webhook/templates/_helpers.tpl
webhook/templates/validating-webhook.yaml
webhook/templates/NOTES.txt
webhook/templates/serviceaccount.yaml
webhook/.helmignore
webhook/values.yaml
webhook/Chart.yaml
templates/
templates/rbac.yaml
templates/deployment.yaml
templates/_helpers.tpl
templates/NOTES.txt
templates/serviceaccount.yaml
```

Helm refused to install from this archive:
```
chart illegally contains empty path
```

Which confused my completely. Where is a empty path in the archive?! There is no empty path!

I found out the hard way, that Helm requires the files to be in a sub folder inside the archive:
```
cert-manager/OWNERS
cert-manager/values.yaml
cert-manager/requirements.lock
cert-manager/Chart.yaml
cert-manager/requirements.yaml
cert-manager/README.md
cert-manager/webhook/
cert-manager/webhook/templates/
cert-manager/webhook/templates/ca-sync.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/templates/rbac.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/templates/pki.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/templates/service.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/templates/deployment.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/templates/apiservice.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/templates/_helpers.tpl
cert-manager/webhook/templates/validating-webhook.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/templates/NOTES.txt
cert-manager/webhook/templates/serviceaccount.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/.helmignore
cert-manager/webhook/values.yaml
cert-manager/webhook/Chart.yaml
cert-manager/templates/
cert-manager/templates/rbac.yaml
cert-manager/templates/deployment.yaml
cert-manager/templates/_helpers.tpl
cert-manager/templates/NOTES.txt
cert-manager/templates/serviceaccount.yaml
```

A expressive error message would be helpful.
title: Confusing error message for chart archives with files in root folder
